title: CISA Adds Two Known Exploited Vulnerabilities to Catalog
summary: CISA has added two new vulnerabilities to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) Catalog , based on evidence of active exploitation. CVE(s) RoundCube Webmail Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability CVE(s) RoundCube Webmail Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability These types of vulnerabilities are frequent attack vectors for malicious cyber actors and pose significant risks to the federal enterprise.
